alert.note: Alert for Amherst (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Amherst County through 300 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Glasgow, or near Amherst, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Very heavy rainfall with localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amherst... Clifford... Falconerville... Riverville... New Glasgow... and Madison Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
